kundenbewertungen.intro: Bookingflix is connected to the HitKlick.com rating tool. This way, customer ratings can be requested automatically after the appointment. This increases the trust factor towards new customers and you can constantly improve your service thanks to the feedback.

infos.headline: Obtain customer reviews automatically
infos.text:
Once the appointment has been made, customer reviews can be requested automatically.
Your clients will receive an email after the appointment asking for a review. This function can of course be switched off.
Alternatively, you have the option of not publishing the reviews. So you only use the customer votes to optimise your service.

infos.headline: Individual evaluation questions
infos.text: Define which and how many evaluation questions you would like to ask your customers in an uncomplicated way when you set up your appointment calendar. Of course, the customer survey is only an option and can be switched off at any time.

infos.headline: Integration on your website and in the customer portal
infos.text: You can optionally display the ratings you have received directly below the appointment-booking calendar. This helps to boost trust with new customers. The ratings are also published on your service provider profile in the customer portal. This can be deactivated at any time.

kundenbewertungen.subtitle: Customer reviews
kundenbewertungen.title: Constantly improve your service through the reviews of your customers
